thread.title: New Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp arrives at club
thread.title_full: New Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp arrives at club

title: New Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp arrives at club
text:
New Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp arrives at club 9:35am BST - 00:44 
Klopp joins Liverpool after quitting Dortmund seven months ago. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
NOTE: AMATEUR VIDEO QUALITY SHOWS: LIVERPOOL, ENGLAND, UK (OCTOBER 9, 2015)(REUTERS - ACCESS ALL) 1. CAR DRAWS UP OUTSIDE LIVERPOOL FOOTBALL CLUB ENTRANCE 2. CAMERA OPERATOR 3. NEW LIVERPOOL MANAGER JUERGEN KLOPP CLIMBS OUT OF CAR, AFTER A COLLEAGUE/HE WALKS IN 4. LIVERPOOL CLUB LOGO ON THE GROUND OUTSIDE STORY: Liverpool's new manager Juergen Klopp arrived at his new club on Friday morning (October 9), promising to bring "full throttle" football with a "big heart" to Anfield. The German was unveiled as the Merseyside's club new manager through the club's website on Thursday night, and he will be presented to reporters and to fans on Friday. The club's American owners, Fenway Sports Group, signed the former Borussia Dortmund manager on what is reported to be a three-year contract, after sacking Northern Irishman Brendan Rodgers on Sunday. One of the most coveted managers in world football, Klopp has been out of work since May when he finished a seven-year reign at Dortmund to take a sabbatical. Klopp has been joined at Liverpool by Zeljko Buvac and Peter Krawietz, his former assistants at Dortmund.
